EXISTING STRUCTURES
───────────────────────
### Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of a stone furnace used for smelting operations. It remains at position (0.0, 0.0) and continues to serve as the central processing structure for converting ore into metal plates.

### Lab with Power Connection at position (10.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab positioned at (10.5, 0.5) intended for Automation Technology research. (Note: It is currently not receiving power.)
- Small Electric Pole placed at (10.5, -1.5) connected to the Lab to provide power.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Inventory shortages when powering or crafting critical components  
  - Confirm that prerequisite power items (e.g. Small Electric Poles) are available in the inventory before attempting to power a structure.
  - Ensure raw resources (e.g. wood) are gathered prior to requesting the crafting of items that require them.

• Furnace output delays and timeout issues  
  - Verify furnace conditions and fuel levels to reduce waiting attempts for smelting outputs.
  - Monitor the furnace’s production rate to avoid timeouts and ensure sufficient material throughput.

• SteamEngine crafting failures due to insufficient iron-plates  
  - Before attempting to craft a SteamEngine, ensure that the required iron-plates have been adequately produced either through smelting or are available in inventory.
  - Recheck available quantities and ensure the furnace has completed processing to meet the recipe requirements.

• Crafting and research prerequisite issues (from previous steps)  
  - For assembling machine crafting and automation research, verify that necessary technology and resource inputs are available to prevent stalling of operations.
